The One Sword.name: The One Sword
The One Sword.flavor: Your blade flashes with the twilight power of the Feywild as you strike your foe.
The One Sword.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. Make the secondary attack against the target.
The One Sword.secondaryOnHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn, and this power is not expended.

Shape the Dream.name: Shape the Dream
Shape the Dream.flavor: You alter reality slightly, so that an attack your foe assumed it had made didn’t actually happen.
Shape the Dream.trigger: You are hit by an attack against your Will.
Shape the Dream.effect: The attack has no effect on you.

Corellon’s Blade.name: Corellon’s Blade
Corellon’s Blade.flavor: You swing your glowing longsword around you, striking nearby enemies with the flat of the blade and banishing them into the Feywild.
Corellon’s Blade.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Corellon’s Blade.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier radiant damage. In addition, the target is removed from play until the end of your next turn. When the target returns to play, it appears in its former space, or if that space is occupied, the target appears in the nearest unoccupied space (its choice).
